AuthPage.description: Sign in to your Bebrayan account to share your thoughts and connect with a trusted circle of friends in a private, secure space. Your conversations, your community, your privacy.

Profile.notFoundDescription: The user profile you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been removed.

Post.notFoundDescription: The post you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been removed.

Info.websitePurpose: This website is created for author portfolio purposes.

Setting.appearanceDescription: Customize how the interface looks and feels.
Setting.profileDescription: This is how others will see you on the platform.
Setting.usernameDescription: This is your public display name.
Setting.emailDescription: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Setting.avatarDescription: JPG, GIF or PNG. Max size of 1MB.
